paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Overall, all-cause mortality was greatest in patients with ATTRv who were NYHA Class III at baseline (78.9%), followed by patients with ATTRwt who were NYHA Class III (54.5%)...
Overall, all-cause mortality was greatest in patients with ATTRv who were NYHA Class III at baseline (78.9%), followed by patients with ATTRwt who were NYHA Class III (54.5%)...

functional_data.summary: Functional capacity declined markedly over time.

variants.additional_notes: The majority of patients with ATTRv had more severe disease at baseline.
key_quotes: Patients with ATTRv, compared with ATTRwt, had more severe disease at baseline.
Overall, all-cause mortality was greatest in patients with ATTRv who were NYHA Class III at baseline (78.9%).

tables_processed.table_caption: All-cause, and CV-related, mortality in all patients and by genotype and NYHA class at baseline

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data focused on the TTR gene and its variants.
